abstract: Analysts and oil buyers will closely follow OPEC and Russia meeting in Qatar to gauge whether they will cooperate enough to implement discipline in market, and possibly cut production to strengthen oil prices; with Saudi Arabia and Russia in full production mode, more than one million barrels of oil daily is added to overflowing world supply.
lead_paragraph: All eyes will be on this weekend’s meeting of OPEC members and Russia, watching for signs that they can cooperate enough to exercise market discipline.

headline.main: As Oil Nations Consider a Freeze, Looking for Tensions to Thaw
headline.print_headline: Oil Freeze May Rest  on a Thaw in Tensions

snippet: All eyes will be on this weekend’s meeting of OPEC members and Russia, watching for signs that they can cooperate enough to exercise market discipline.

keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
keywords.name: organizations
